kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Check Text At XPath
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${text} = Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created!
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.arg: //p[text()="Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created!"]
Congratulations! Your new account has been successfully created!

kw.name: Check Text At XPath
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${text} = You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience with us.
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.arg: //p[text()="You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience with us."]
You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience with us.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.
